TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MimePartCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class MimePartCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class MimePartCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of instances of the class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart> within the collection represents an extensibility element added to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeMultipartRelatedBinding>, and specifies the MIME type for a corresponding <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [XML Web Services Using ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ba0z6a33(v=vs.100)). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart mimePart);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart mimePart) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, mimePart As MimePart)

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the parameter.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified to the at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `mimePart` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePartCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart mimePart) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of the specified from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed `MimePart` move up to occupy the vacated spot.
